BookLover42 January 15, 2023
★★★★★
This is an amazing book! I loved the adventure and the characters. Bilbo Baggins is such a relatable protagonist, and his journey from a comfort-loving hobbit to a brave adventurer is inspiring. The world-building is incredible, and the writing style is engaging. Highly recommend!
42 likes 5 comments
Shelves: fantasy, classics, favorites
FantasyReader March 22, 2023
★★★★☆
A classic fantasy tale that still holds up today. The pacing is a bit slow at times, but the characters and world are so well-developed that it's easy to forgive. The dragon Smaug is one of the best villains in literature.
